definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The summit of Western Banquet activities will be the biggest bright spot.
sentences.chinese: 本次峰会的西餐夜宴将是活动的最大亮点。

sentences.english: One free draft beer for purchasing draft beer at Lunch time in De Bistro .
sentences.chinese: 会员在西餐厅享用午餐时，买扎啤可免费赠送一杯。

sentences.english: People from the east are not used to knives and forks when having a western-style meal.
sentences.chinese: 东方人在吃西餐的时候往往用不惯餐刀。

sentences.english: We have Chinese restaurant and a western-style restaurant. Which one do you prefer?
sentences.chinese: 我们有中餐厅和西餐厅，你愿意赴什么？

sentences.english: There is also a supply of foreign Western Hotels, and some will have Tibetan song and dance performances.
sentences.chinese: 涉外宾馆里还供应西餐，有的还会有藏族歌舞表演。

sentences.english: Does the child have the discount at Western Restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 在酒店西餐厅儿童是否享有优惠？

sentences.english: Do you know any nice Westren Restaurant nearby?
sentences.chinese: 你知道哪些不错的西餐厅在附近吗？

sentences.english: Uniform for western restaurant is bright-colored and for Chinese restaurant is classical.
sentences.chinese: 西餐厅的服装活泼亮丽，中餐厅的婉约古典。

sentences.english: His restaurant has two storeys , sells orthodox western-style food, and most famous as its Pizza.
sentences.chinese: 小店分上下两层，专营正宗西餐，尤以比萨最出名。

sentences.english: Minimun 3 years Western Restaurant work experiences in same position.
sentences.chinese: 具有3年以上国际品牌酒店西餐厅管理经验。

sentences.english: Mongolia Kaluoxi supply of gourmet cuisine restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 蒙地卡罗西餐厅供应各类美食佳肴。

sentences.english: The Ming's restaurant is located on 36th floor in the Majestic Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 名人汇西餐厅位于大华酒店36层顶楼。

sentences.english: Western's first course is the first disc, also known as appetizer.
sentences.chinese: 西餐的第一道菜是头盘，也称为开胃品。

sentences.english: Through the autumn Chen saw Wang Shu clouds and friends to have dinner in western restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 历秋辰在西餐厅看见了王淑云和朋友一起吃饭。

sentences.english: Fish dishes generally as Western's third dish, also known as the Deputy dishes.
sentences.chinese: 鱼类菜肴一般作为西餐的第三道菜，也称为副菜。

sentences.english: Banquet food for each per capita consumption of 888 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 西餐夜宴的人均消费为每位888元人民币。

definition: Japanese cuisine (abbr. for 日本料理[Ri4 ben3 liao4 li3])
dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
